title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 132.2 - Annual maintenance fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 132.2 - Annual maintenance fee

State Regulations

The annual maintenance fee for a traffic-control signal
erected pursuant to section
1681
(c) of the Vehicle and Traffic Law shall be
$1,251.62 for signals operated on a year round basis and $938.72 for signals
operated on a seasonal or part-time basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
132.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
